title: CONNECTIVE SUPPORT SOCIETY
author: ''
date: '2022-08-29'
slug: connective_support_society
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.8M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with CONNECTIVE SUPPORT SOCIETY. The average
  contract duration was 1.61 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.5M.
  The longest contract was 3 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $4.7M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.8M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '14%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '322%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '44.3K'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1.61'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '1.5M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '3'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '4.7M'
---
